001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.util;
002
003import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
004import net.kyori.adventure.text.TextComponent;
005import net.kyori.adventure.text.format.TextColor;
006import net.kyori.adventure.text.format.TextDecoration;
007
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import java.util.Arrays;
010import java.util.List;
011
012import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Numbers;
013
014public final class Timeline {
015    public record Section(TextColor color, double percent) {}
016
017    private final int length;
018    private double complete;
019    private final List<Section> sections = new ArrayList<>();
020
021    public Timeline(int length) {
022        this.length = length;
023    }
024
025    public int length() { return length; }
026
027    public double complete() { return complete; }
028    public Timeline complete(double complete) { this.complete = complete; return this; }
029
030    public List<Section> sections() { return sections; }
031    public Timeline add(Section... sections) { this.sections.addAll(Arrays.asList(sections)); return this; }
032
033    public Component build() {
034        TextComponent[] components = new TextComponent[length];
035        Arrays.fill(components, Component.text(" "));
036        int completeIdx = Numbers.clamp((int) (complete * length), 0, length - 1);
037        components[completeIdx] = components[completeIdx].content("|");
038
039        double current = 0;
040        for (var section : sections) {
041            double percent = section.percent;
042            int start = (int) Math.round(current * length);
043            for (int i = start; i < start + (percent * length); i++) {
044                int clamped = Numbers.clamp(i, 0, length - 1);
045                components[clamped] = components[clamped].color(section.color);
046            }
047            current += percent;
048            if (current >= 1)
049                break;
050        }
051
052        var builder = Component.text().decorate(TextDecoration.STRIKETHROUGH);
053        for (var component : components)
054            builder.append(component);
055        return builder.build();
056    }
057}
